forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Sunny then Showers And Thunderstorms Likely
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely after 2pm. Mostly sunny. High near 90, with temperatures falling to around 86 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 8 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms then Showers And Thunderstorms Likely
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms before 7pm, then showers and thunderstorms likely between 7pm and 1am. Partly cloudy. Low around 67, with temperatures rising to around 69 overnight. West southwest wind 6 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
